languages.text: По данным от блюстителей Чорда, Владайм проводит тайные встречи в баре "Адептус Амасекус". Встретившись с ним, Лорд-капитан сможет обсудить сложившуюся на Футфоле обстановку.

traits.locale_text: По данным от блюстителей Чорда, Владайм проводит тайные встречи в баре "Адептус Амасекус". Обсудите с ним обстановку на станции.

languages.text: According to the information gathered by Chorda enforcers, Vladaym is holding secret meetings at the Adeptus Amasecus bar. This could be the Lord Captain's chance to discuss the situation that Footfall finds itself in.
languages.original_text: По данным от блюстителей Чорда, Владайм проводит тайные встречи в баре "Адептус Амасекус". Встретившись с ним, Лорд-капитан сможет обсудить сложившуюся на Футфоле обстановку.

traits.locale_text: According to the information gathered by Chorda enforcers, Vladaym is holding secret meetings at the Adeptus Amasecus bar. This could be the Lord Captain's chance to discuss the situation that Footfall has found itself in.

According to the information gathered by Chorda enforcers, Vladaym is holding secret meetings at the Adeptus Amasecus bar. This could be the Lord Captain's chance to discuss the situation that Footfall has found itself in.

According to the information gathered by Chorda enforcers, Vladaym is holding secret meetings at the Adeptus Amasecus bar. This could be the Lord Captain's chance to discuss the situation that Footfall finds itself in.

According to the information gathered by Chorda enforcers, Vladaym is holding secret meetings at the Adeptus Amasecus bar. This could be the Lord Captain's chance to discuss the situation that Footfall finds itself in.

languages.text: Selon les informations recueillies par les prévôts de la maison Chorda, Vladaym tient des réunions secrètes dans le bar de l'Adeptus Amasecus. Cela pourrait être l'occasion pour {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} de discuter de la situation dans laquelle se trouve Castel.
languages.original_text: According to the information gathered by Chorda enforcers, Vladaym is holding secret meetings at the Adeptus Amasecus bar. This could be the Lord Captain's chance to discuss the situation that Footfall finds itself in.

traits.locale_text: Selon les informations recueillies par les prévôts de la maison Chorda, Vladaym tient des réunions secrètes dans le bar de l'Adeptus Amasecus. Cela pourrait être l'occasion pour {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} de discuter de la situation dans laquelle se trouve Castel.

languages.text: 根据库尔达的执法者收集到的信息，弗拉迪姆此刻正在艾玛赛克烈酒修会进行秘密会议。或许行商浪人可以借着这个机会，插手落脚港当前的局势。
languages.original_text: According to the information gathered by Chorda enforcers, Vladaym is holding secret meetings at the Adeptus Amasecus bar. This could be the Lord Captain's chance to discuss the situation that Footfall finds itself in.

traits.locale_text: 根据库尔达的执法者收集到的信息，弗拉迪姆此刻正在艾玛赛克烈酒修会进行秘密会议。或许行商浪人可以借着这个机会，插手落脚港当前的局势。

languages.text: チョーダのエンフォーサーが集めた情報によると、ヴラダイムはアデプトゥス・アマセックの酒場で秘密の会合を開いている。これはロード・キャプテンに訪れた、フットフォールが置かれている状況について話し合うチャンスかもしれない。
languages.original_text: According to the information gathered by Chorda enforcers, Vladaym is holding secret meetings at the Adeptus Amasecus bar. This could be the Lord Captain's chance to discuss the situation that Footfall finds itself in.

traits.locale_text: チョーダのエンフォーサーが集めた情報によると、ヴラダイムはアデプトゥス・アマセックの酒場で秘密の会合を開いている。これはロード・キャプテンに訪れた、フットフォールが置かれている状況について話し合うチャンスかもしれない。

languages.text: Die Chorda-Enforcers haben in Erfahrung gebracht, dass Vladaym in der Bar Adeptus Amasecus geheime Treffen abhält. Das könnte dem Lord Captain die Gelegenheit bieten, über Footfalls momentane Lage zu sprechen.
languages.original_text: According to the information gathered by Chorda enforcers, Vladaym is holding secret meetings at the Adeptus Amasecus bar. This could be the Lord Captain's chance to discuss the situation that Footfall finds itself in.

traits.locale_text: Die Chorda-Enforcers haben in Erfahrung gebracht, dass Vladaym in der Bar Adeptus Amasecus geheime Treffen abhält. Das könnte dem Lord Captain die Gelegenheit bieten, über Footfalls momentane Lage zu sprechen.

languages.text: Según la información recopilada por el personal de seguridad de Chorda, Vladaym celebra reuniones secretas en el Adeptus Amasecus. Podría ser la ocasión que busca {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán para hablar de la situación de Paso.
languages.original_text: According to the information gathered by Chorda enforcers, Vladaym is holding secret meetings at the Adeptus Amasecus bar. This could be the Lord Captain's chance to discuss the situation that Footfall finds itself in.

traits.locale_text: Según la información recopilada por el personal de seguridad de Chorda, Vladaym celebra reuniones secretas en el Adeptus Amasecus. Podría ser la ocasión que busca {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán para hablar de la situación de Paso.

languages.text: Chorda infazcılarının topladığı bilgilere göre Vladaym, Adeptus Amasekus barında gizli buluşmalar düzenliyormuş. Lord Kaptan, bu fırsattan istifade Binliman'ın içinde bulunduğu durumu tartışabilir.
languages.original_text: According to the information gathered by Chorda enforcers, Vladaym is holding secret meetings at the Adeptus Amasecus bar. This could be the Lord Captain's chance to discuss the situation that Footfall finds itself in.
